text: Leo Schwarz (9 October 1931 – 26 November 2018) was a German Catholic figure. He was born in Braunweiler, Germany. Schwarz was from 1982 to 2006 the Roman Catholic auxiliary bishop in the diocese of Trier, and was bishop of Abbir Germaniciana. Bishop Leo Schwarz, at catholic-hierarchy.org.Bishop Leo Schwarz Schwarz died on 26 November 2018 in Cologne, Germany from lymphoma at the age of 87.Unermüdlicher Anwalt für die Armen und Kleinen weltweit ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:German Roman Catholic bishops
title: Leo Schwarz
